income_messages:
From: a***********o@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-14 04:12:41
SUBJECT: Dear friend,
Dear friend,
My name is Mr. Abraham Akufo , I am a newly promoted Branch Manager of a Bank here in Ghana, West Africa, I got your information during my search through the Internet. It may interest you to hear that I am a man of PEACE and don't want problems, I only hope we can assist each other. If you don't, I want this business offer to kindly forget it, as I will not contact you again. I have packaged a financial transaction that will benefit both of us, as the Branch Manager of the Bank, it is my duty to send in a Financial Report to my head office in the capital city Accra at the end of each year. In the course of the last year 2022 end of the year report, I discovered that my branch in which I am the Manager made an excess profit of Three Million Six Hundred Thousand Dollars [US$3,600,000.00] which my head office is not aware of and will never be aware of. I have since placed this fund
in a SUNDRY ACCOUNT.
As an officer of the bank I cannot be directly linked to this money, so this informed my contacting you for us to work together so that you can assist me and receive this fund into your bank account in your country for us to SHARE.I am offering you 30% of the total fund, while you keep 70% for me in your bank account till I join you in your country for the sharing/investment of my own share of the funds or better still we can go into a joint partnership venture, I will appreciate it very much. As soon as I receive your response I will give you more details on how we can achieve it successfully.
I am married with four lovely children.
Thank you and God bless us .
Await your swift response towards my plead.
Sincerely,
Mr. Abraham Akufo
aabrahamakufo@gmail.com
From: a***********o@gmail.com
To: ui15838@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-14 06:33:06
SUBJECT: Re: Dear friend,
Dear Friend
Thank you for your respond.I really appreciate your email and the content
is well understood.
First I have to program you full information into our bank computer
networking data base as the original depositor and beneficiary of this
fund, and it will reflect in my head office at Accra the capital city of
Ghana, so that when they check in the database and confirm your info to be
correct, they will without delays transfer the fund to any of your
nominated bank account that you will provide.
Bellow is the information i need from you for us to proceed:
1) Full Name
2) Occupation
3) Age:
4) Telephone Number/fax number:
5) Nationality
6) Sex/ Marital Status:
7) Contact Address:
[8)] Driven License or international passport
please you should follow my directive so that we will have this fund
transfer to your nominated bank account in your country.Lastly .immediately
this fund is transferred to your account i will give you 30 percent of the
total fund and also give you the US$3,600,000.00 that's to tell you how
honest I am.
I Await your Quick reply.
Best Regard.
Mr. Abraham Akufo
outbound_messages:
From: ui15838@m**************m

Time: 2023-03-14 04:12:42
SUBJECT: Re: Dear friend,
I am looking forward to this opportunity, though I want to fully know the potential risks and your plan.
